block.p: DOMINION RESOURCES INC., -- Richmond, Va., the top integrated electricity and natural gas company in the United States, agreed to sell $948 million in commercial loans held by its First Source Financial unit to GE Capital Commercial Finance, a unit of the General Electric Co., Fairfield, Conn.

DOMINION RESOURCES INC., -- Richmond, Va., the top integrated electricity and natural gas company in the United States, agreed to sell $948 million in commercial loans held by its First Source Financial unit to GE Capital Commercial Finance, a unit of the General Electric Co., Fairfield, Conn.

FIRST UNION CORP., -- Charlotte, N.C., the sixth-largest bank in the United States, said it was not in talks to be acquired by Wells Fargo & Co., San Francisco. The company was the subject of recent speculation that it might be taken over by Wells Fargo.
